name: Potion Seller (Hydric)
description:
Welcome to the potion shop, where all of the potion selling, bottling, and crafting takes place! Everything you could dream of doing is possible inside this shop. Step foot inside and you'll never want to leave again.

Crafting magical essence has never been simpler with the new "Crafto-rama"! The Crafto-rama can create all of the magical essences a alchemist could need! Provided they have the proper ingredients.

Now that the "bottle-omatic" has been invented, no more do poor potion makers have to pour and cork their potions! This machine does all of the hard work for them!

With the all new catalogue! Potion makers across the world have been able to easily buy ingredients to make more empty bottles or more magical essensce!

Follow The Development:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Hydric60372515
Itch: https://hydric-games.itch.io/potion-seller
